conbody.p: The following tables lists issues that have been resolved since the last release of Eucalyptus.

row.entry: iSCSI Perl scripts fail to work if hostname is used instead of IP address for the SAN
Allocating an address against quota message is off by one.
DataTables warning (table id = 'instances'): Requested unknown parameter 'placement' from the data source for row 0
Reload of iSCSI targets on OverlayManager SC reboot does not occur
Multicast unreliability cripples system; dependence on multicast contraindicated in some deployments
Uncaught exception in AbstractConfigurableProperty causes euca-describe-properties to return a RuntimeException
Attaching volumes to bfebs instance can cause fs mounted on backing vol to err or lockup
User Console logins fail after upgrade from 3.2.0 to 3.2.1
launch instance failed due to error: failed to allocate artifact prt-159232ext3-09be6495 (8 blobstore.c:2211 no space left) on try 1
The call of "udevadm trigger" is not safe in iscsi connect scripts
euca-describe-volumes (verbose) takes a long time to return with results
euca-describe-nodes does not return consistent results
Volumes created from a snapshot for bfEBS have incorrect filesystem permissions
VMware: imager *still* fails to install grub
